thread.title: Great place to stay for Broadway shows! - Review
thread.title_full: Great place to stay for Broadway shows! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Michael H
title: Great place to stay for Broadway shows! - Review
text:
The concierge at this hotel, Sho, was excellent. He was able to print tickets for any show or tour. We very much appreciate the help.
The hotel was clean and well kept. Breakfast was a little bit on the expensive side.
